val N = 10
val variance = 1.0
val rand = new util.Random(0)

case class Pixel(x: Double, y: Boolean)

val image = (0 until N).map(i =>
    (0 until N).map(j => {
        val y = ((i + j)/2) % 3 == 0
        val x = (if(y) 1.0 else -1.0) + variance*rand.nextGaussian()
        Pixel(x, y)
    }))
Matrix(image)(p => if(p.y) 1.0 else 0.0)
